name: ImpossibleSoundsKidsVersion
0:
”Alexa, open Impossible Sounds”
”Alexa, start Impossible Sounds”
”Alexa, launch Impossible Sounds”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: impossible sounds
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Impossible Sounds Kids Version 1.0 is a guessing game with a difficulty from easy to hard. We hope you will enjoy playing this game and will leave your valuable feedback. Look for our other offerings on your Alexa App or at BubbleLogix.com. Impossible Sounds Kids Edition is a Bubble Logix Property designed on Voice Flow.

How its played: Welcome to Impossible Sounds Kids Edition! During the game a moment of sound will be played! You will be asked for your answer. You will be offered a second and longer soundbite. If a correct answer is not given then a third and last soundbite will be played. When playing, If after the third soundbite a correct answer is not given. You will be given the option to try the last soundbite again or to go to the next Sound.

When you say your answers. Be careful if this is a multiplayer game, there could be spoilers in your midst. You can guess your answer, say repeat or say next for the next soundbite. Your game will end after all of the game's sounds have been solved.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
